data.Sentence_cn: 当我们穿过旧德里的市场时走了很长一段路，我们在一个广场上停下来休息。
data.Sentence: As we had had a long walk through one of the markets of old Delhi, we stopped at a square to have a rest.

data.Sentence_cn: 过了一会儿，我们注意到广场的那一边有一个带着两个大筐的耍蛇人，于是就走过去看看。
data.Sentence: After a time, we noticed a snake charmer with two large baskets at the other side of the square, so we went to have a look at him.

data.Sentence_cn: 他一见我们，就拿起了一个长长的上面镶有硬币的管乐器，并掀开了一个筐的盖子。
data.Sentence: As soon as he saw us, he picked up a long pipe which was covered with coins and opened one of the baskets.

data.Sentence_cn: 当他开始吹奏一支曲子时，我们才第一次看到那条蛇。
data.Sentence: When he began to play a tune, we had our first glimpse of the snake.

data.Sentence_cn: 它从筐里探出身子，随着乐器的摆动而扭动。
data.Sentence: It rose out of the basket and began to follow the movements of the pipe.

data.Sentence_cn: 当耍蛇人突然又吹奏起爵士乐和现代流行乐曲时，
data.Sentence: We were very much surprised when the snake charmer suddenly began to play jazz and modern pop songs.

data.Sentence_cn: 我们感到非常惊奇。然而那蛇却还是缓慢地“舞动”着。
data.Sentence: The snake, however, continued to 'dance' slowly.

data.Sentence_cn: 显然，它分辨不出印度音乐和爵士乐！
data.Sentence: It obviously could not tell the difference between Indian music and jazz!
